title: As a user I want to be able to Print Payroll Details
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is in Payroll Tab on Major Contract
custom_steps: WHEN user is viewing the Payroll tab of a MJ Contract
custom_expected:
THEN there will be a "Print" button. 
AND Clicking the Print button will launch the Payroll Details report for the Payroll tab being viewed.
AND The pdf will match the provided specifications.

title: As a User, I want to run the 2+ Salary Arbitration Eligibility
custom_preconds:
Report Layout:
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/EBIS4-TXT-5146+Report+Layout
Report Details:
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/EBIS4-TXT-5147+Report+Details
Population, Logic, and Sorting:
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/EBIS4-TXT-5148+Population%2C+Logic+and+Sort+Considerations
Prompts:
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/EBIS4-TXT-5150+Prompts
GIVEN a user is logged in as club or boc
AND user has navigated to Reporting Widget
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks link for Super 2+ Arbitration Report
custom_expected:
THEN system should display prompts matching wiki documentation
AND selecting prompts and clicking ok should generate the Super 2+ Arbitration Report matching wiki report layout and details

title: As a User, I want to View a MN Affiliate Profile
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is in Affiliate Profiles widget
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks on a Club Name in the Affiliate Profile Widget
custom_expected:
THEN system will open an Affiliate Profile in View Mode
AND Layout will match the provided wire and data discovery
AND Browser tab text = "Profile - Club Name"
AND Logo management will be handled in a future story
AND Address and Staff section will be handled in a separate story
AND This includes the profile header "i.e. Reno Aces - 3A Pacific Coast League"

Wireframe:
http://7xflwf.axshare.com/#p=minor_league_affiliate_profile

title: As a User, I want to make sure Club Effective Dates aren't overlapping
custom_preconds:
GIVEN an existing club has been renamed via the Rename Club process from the Club profile
AND user has the newest version of the club profile open in edit mode
AND user has entered an effective date that is prior to the end date of the previous version of the club
custom_expected:
THEN system should run a check against effective dates to make sure the current dates are not overlapping with previous versions of the club
AND if the check fails, return an error message:
Title: Invalid Effective Date
Body: New effective dates can not be earlier than the end date of a previous version of the club
Hint: You need to modify the effective date so it is after the prior version's end date
